Hey coder out there!! Welcome to C^3.
One fine day, when Chef was searching for Dosa recipe in the kitchen, he finds a note saying " 0, 101, 201, 312, 379 stands for the 4-letter word 'Code'. Then what about 0, 51,145, 212, 262, 363, 472, 583, 682, 790, 891, 978 ?" Now Chef decides to decode it. So he approaches you for the help. Help him out to sove this riddle. You might even get a Dosa as the reward.!

Output
Your code has to print the answer in a single line.
